text: Ezɨ Judan anabamɨn adarazi kamaghɨn Simeonɨn anabamɨn adaraziv gei, “Aveghbuaba, ia izɨ en gɨn mangɨ nguazir God e danɨngasa mɨkemezimɨn mangɨva bar uari akuvagh, Kenanian adarazi ko mɨsogham. Egh gɨn e bar moghɨra mangɨ nguazir God ia ganɨngizimɨn mangam.” Ezɨ Simeonɨn adarasi, Judan adarazi ko zui.
